name: Dance Fighter
description:
Controls: 

Player 1: Z (Attack)  - X (Beat)

Player 2: N (Attack) - M (Beat)

Pause Game: ESC / P

In order to Attack, you must to sync to the Beat. Your Attack must also be on time!

1 Beat + 1 Attack = 1 Damage.

2 Beat + 1 Attack = 2 Damage.

3 Beat + 1 Attack = 4 Damage

The winner will be the last one standing or the one with higher HP at the end of the Music!

---------------------------

In the streets, you gotta have Rythm. The Tempo is the only law. You gotta Beat your opponents!

In this project I tried to mix  a Fighting game with a Rythm game.

Project Git: https://github.com/danielcardosot17/dance_fighter

Any questions feel free to ask!

Thanks!
